articles.title: Pyongyang Designated as Venue for 17th World Taekwon-Do Championships
articles.content:
Pyongyang Designated as Venue for 17th World Taekwon-Do Championships
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang, the capital of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, was designated as the venue for the 17th World Taekwon-Do Championships to be held in the year of 2011.
					Pyongyang and Basel of Switzerland had been chosen as the candidate cities for the 2011 World Taekwon-Do Championships. The annual meeting of the Executive Committee of the International Taekwon-Do Federation (ITF) held in Vienna in February this year selected Pyongyang as the sole candidate city for the forthcoming championships.
					
					According to this, the 18th ITF General Meeting called in Uzbekistan in September formally decided that Pyongyang would be the venue for the World Taekwon-Do Championships to be held in Juche 100 (2011).
					
					At the meeting, the members of the ITF and the representatives from 60 odd countries fully approved and supported the decision to hold the 17th World Taekwon-Do Championships in the DPRK, the homeland of Taekwon-Do, in 2011.
					
					Pyongyang hosted the 8th World Taekwon-Do Championships in 1992.
					
					The date of the championships is to be decided in future.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Invention and New Technology Closes
articles.content:
ational Exhibition of Invention and New Technology Closes
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The 10th national exhibition of invention and new technology which was opened on Oct. 1 closed with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition today.
					 The exhibition showcased inventions and new technological achievements made by officials, scientists, technicians and other working people from across the country in various fields including power, coal, metal industry and railway transport through mass technical renovation drive.
					
					 During the exhibition measures were taken to introduce scientific and technological achievements for the substantial development of the nation's science and technology. Its period witnessed technological exchange, the distribution of products appreciated as intellectual properties and technical information service.
					
					 Present there were Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the Cabinet, other officials concerned and scientists, technicians and other working people.
					
					 Pyon Yong Rip, president of the State Academy of Sciences, in a speech made at the closing ceremony called on the scientists and technicians to devote all their wisdom and energies to developing new technologies with ardent patriotism and thus positively contribute to the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chief of Palestinian National Authority
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chief of Palestinian National Authority
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket was conveyed to an official concerned by Ibrahim Abu Mualik, charge d'affaires a.i. of the Palestinian embassy here, today.

articles.title: New Documentary Released
articles.content:
New Documentary Released
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Korean Documentary and Scientific Film Studio released documentary "My Country Has Triumphed by Dint of Single-Minded Unity".
					 The film impressively shows the history of the DPRK that has always emerged victorious by dint of the single-minded unity under the leadership of the peerlessly great men through scenes of mammoth mass demonstrations held in every period of the revolution.
					
					 It deals with the demonstration held 60 years ago in celebration of the birth of the DPRK, celebrations marking its 10th birthday and other scenes dating back to the 1960s, the 1970s and the 1980s showing the true picture of the harmonious whole formed between the leader and the people.
					
					 It has scenes dealing with a mass demonstration held in celebration of the 50th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 The film underscores the conviction that the victorious history of Kim Il Sung's Korea will continue for all ages and socialist Korea prosper forever as long as there is General Secretary Kim Jong Il who ushered in the dawn of a great prosperous powerful nation by making long journeys of the Songun leadership with total dedication to the people and noble comradeship.

articles.title: Collection of Reminiscences Off Press
articles.content:
Collection of Reminiscences Off Press
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out collection of reminiscences "Among the People" Vol. 76.
					 The book contains 16 reminiscences dealing with the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by energetically leading the work to develop the nation's agricultural science and increase the agricultural production till the last moments of his great life from the country's liberation and his noble popular traits.
					
					 Reminiscences "Profound love and trust shown for agricultural scientists" tell the story that the President found out agricultural scientists one after another after the liberation of the country and showed deep loving care and trust for them, indicating to them specific ways of solving issues arising in their researches.
					
					 The book also contains reminiscences recounting the touching story that the President worked heart and soul to cultivate seed rice for non-paddy fields to settle people's problem of food and to this end tilled an experimental field in the garden of his house where he conducted experiments on crops, fruit trees and others.
					
					 Reminiscences such as "Wisely leading the research into bean" and "During the days of realizing comprehensive mechanization of agriculture" deal with his tireless efforts to lead agricultural scientists to successfully conduct researches into bean cultivation and free peasants from difficult and hard farm work.
					
					 Edited in the book are reminiscences telling the story that the President singled it out as an important issue arising in the field of agricultural science to overcome abnormal climatic phenomena and visited the Academy of Agricultural Science to indicate the orientation and ways for doing so.
					
					 It contains reminiscences dealing with the facts that the President clarified scientific and technological issues arising in breeding and cultivating high-yielding seed rice, led the work to bring about a signal turn in vegetable farming, gave instructions to successfully do potato farming and double cropping and cultivate fruit trees and indicated ways of settling issues arising in overall agricultural scientific researches.

articles.title: Economic Achievements in DPRK
articles.content:
Economic Achievements in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Many successes have been made in the basic industrial sectors, the pace-setting domains of the national economy in the DPRK.
					 Kanggye Youth, Thaechon, Sodusu power stations and other hydro-power stations are striving to increase the output of electricity with existing water.
					
					 Those at coal mines under the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Complex have worked hard to increase coal production every day by concentrating efforts on the coal fields with rich deposits and raising the operation rate of equipment.
					
					 Good results are also reported from coal mines in areas of Pukchang, Tokchon, Tukjang, Kaechon and Kangdong, which have introduced efficient cutting method while always giving precedence to tunneling.
					
					  In the sector of metal industry a vigorous drive has been pushed ahead to complete and introduce the Korean method of iron production.
					
					 The Songjin Steel Complex and the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex have increased iron and steel production by introducing the Juche-oriented method of iron production and accelerating technical modernization. The Chollima Steel Complex finished the modernization of electric furnaces and is carrying out the test production there while directing efforts to the immediate production.
					
					 Those at iron ore mines across the country including the Musan Mining Complex are striving to provide the metal industrial sector with enough iron ore.
					
					 The Ministry of Railways is taking pains to carry in time the materials needed for various domains of the national economy.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Escalating Military Tension in Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Escalating Military Tension in Korea
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- On September 23 the U.S. House of Representatives adopted a "bill on closer U.S.-south Korea defense cooperation" the keynote of which is to raise south Korea's status in purchasing U.S.-made weapons and military equipment to that of NATO. In its wake the U.S. Senate passed the similar bill.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed commentary carried in this regard observes:
					
					 U.S. Congress's adoption of the above-said bill betrays a sinister intention to round off the preparations for the second Korean war and reinforce the "military alliance" between the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					  This is a criminal act of escalating the tension and military stand-off on the Korean Peninsula and seriously jeopardizing peace.
					
					  It is the intention of the U.S. to effectively use the south Korean puppets in a war anytime, keeping them as a faithful "military ally" in carrying out its anti-DPRK strategy and servants for aggression.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to retain an unchallenged military and strategic edge in Asia as it attaches key importance to establishing unchallenged domination over it in a bid to put its strategy for global domination into practice. It is the strategic scenario of the U.S. to set up a new "security mechanism" of NATO type in Asia and contain the DPRK and put the rest of Asia under its military control using it as a lever.
					
					 Now is the time for the DPRK and the U.S. to promote a climate of bilateral confidence and detente. This notwithstanding, the U.S. is busy coiling up the military tension and increasing the danger of war on the peninsula as evidenced by the legal action taken by it to "boost the defense cooperation" with south Korea in an effort to stifle the DPRK. This is an action against peace as it is quite contrary to the trend of the times.
					
					  The U.S. would be well advised to give up its reckless military scenario, cogitating about the ensuing consequences.

articles.title: GNP Accused of Inciting Confrontation with Compatriots
articles.content:
GNP Accused of Inciting Confrontation with Compatriots
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A few days ago riff-raffs of the Grand National Party of south Korea, citing information released by the "Ministry of Unification", talked the nonsense that "there was the great possibility of the money provided to the north over the past decade of being used for the nuclear development" in the north. They also blustered that the north bolstered its military muscle while they were in dispute over the controversial issue of reckless assistance on the basis of nonsensical information that it introduced weapons from other countries in recent years.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 Their reckless remarks are intended to defame the undertakings for inter-Korean cooperation which made good progress over the last decade. They betray the GNP's criminal attempt to justify their acts of treachery, which blocked the advance of the June 15 era of reunification and brought the inter-Korean relations to collapse, and spark off new confrontation with compatriots. This is intolerable. 
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrent is the fruition of the line for building independent national economy as it serves as a powerful treasured sword for defending peace on the Korean Peninsula, the commentary notes, and continues:
					
					 This nonsensical talk about the "possible use of fund for the development of nukes in the north" can be made only by the GNP gentry who know nothing about it and cannot know anything about it.
					
					 Undertakings for inter-Korean cooperation are patriotic ones for development and prosperity common to the nation, not to meet the interests of one side. The GNP is a traitorous and anti-reunification party as it is pulling up the north over the issue of the above-said cooperation to serve its sinister political purpose.
					
					 It is the ulterior aim of the GNP to terminate the June 15 era of reunification and bring back instead the past era of confrontation, totally negating the north-south joint declarations supported and hailed by all Koreans, under the motto of "regaining the lost decade."
					
					 It is great irony and tragedy that these good-for-nothings are going reckless, utterly unable to discern such wrong way of thinking and behavior as escalating the confrontation with the north.

articles.title: Japan's Missile Hysteria Condemned
articles.content:
Japan's Missile Hysteria Condemned
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are planning to stage a maritime interceptor missile test by SM-3 in November in the wake of the Air "Self-Defense Force's" recent ballistic missile interception test by PAC-3 in the U.S. forces' missile launching ground in New Mexico State, the U.S.
					 This shows that the Japanese reactionaries' scheme for turning Japan into a military power and staging a comeback has reached a very dangerous stage, bringing about an actual danger.
					
					 Minju Joson today says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 They assert that such moves for bolstering their missile forces are aimed at "defending" Japan from someone's "missile threat." This is nothing but very absurd and brazen-faced sophism, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Their moves to establish missile defence system under the cloak of "defence" are part of reinvasion preparations to launch preemptive missile attack on other countries.
					
					 Their planned maritime missile interception test in the wake of the ground missile interception test is intended to acquire the capacity of missile preemptive strike and launch reinvasion as soon as possible.
					
					 The DPRK is the main target of strike in realizing their strategy of preemptive attack.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are getting hell-bent on the moves to establish the missile defence system, in active pursuance to the U.S. policy of aggression on the DPRK, with the wild ambition to stifle the DPRK by force. In the meantime, they are frantically staging the DPRK-targeted joint military exercises of Japan's "Self-Defense Forces" and the U.S. forces, offering their territory as nuclear and missile base and logistic base of the U.S.
					
					 They are also massively deploying the main combat units of the SDF in the western areas of Japan adjacent to the DPRK while accelerating the modernization of the SDF on a full scale.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are closely following the arms-buildup of the Japanese reactionaries going on under the pretext of "threat" and will bolster its military capabilities for self-defence to cope with such moves.
					
					 The right to preemptive strike is not a monopoly of Japan.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised not to make rash act but drop the wild ambition for reinvasion, pondering over what enormous catastrophic sequences their reckless moves for building up the missile force will bring to Japan.

articles.title: Implementation of October 4 Declaration Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Implementation of October 4 Declaration Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification in a statement on Oct. 4 declared that it would struggle in a do-or-die spirit to oppose the U.S. imperialism and the Lee Myung Bak dictatorial regime and implement the October 4 declaration.
					 The statement recalled that for the past one year since the publication of the historic October 4 declaration the headquarters has worked hard to open up a new era of independent reunification and peace and prosperity along with the June 15 era that was ushered in under the banner of "By our nation itself."
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are now rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula extremely tense while openly posing a threat of preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK in a bid to prevent inter-Korean reconciliation, cooperation and reunification, the statement charged.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak dictatorial regime and sycophantic treacherous forces are getting hell-bent on the fascist suppression of progressive forces, it pointed out, adding: Nothing can dampen the spirit of the people who have turned out in the struggle to get the U.S. forces withdrawn, bring down dictatorship and achieve national reunification.
					
					 The statement further said:
					
					 All Koreans are full of conviction that they can certainly open up the new era of national prosperity and independent reunification if they pool their will and strength.
					
					 The headquarters will never stop the advance for achieving reconciliation and cooperation in the spirit of "By our nation itself" and strengthening the solidarity among the south and the north and the overseas sides.

articles.title: October 4 Declaration Supported in Switzerland
articles.content:
October 4 Declaration Supported in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee issued a statement on Oct. 2 to mark the first anniversary of the publication of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 Noting that the inter-Korean summit was arranged again and the "Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity" was adopted in Pyongyang in October, 2007 thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il's patriotic will for reunification and his bold decision, the statement introduced the declaration in detail.
					
					 The October 4 declaration is a great banner for independent reunification of Korea, it said, and continued:
					
					 The declaration is powerfully encouraging all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad in their efforts to drive the U.S. forces out of south Korea and reunify the country.
					
					 Enshrined in the declaration is the desire of the Korean nation to reunify the country independently, replace the armistice mechanism by a durable peace mechanism and thus ensure security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group serving the U.S. and standing against reunification is desperately working to block it but it can never stop the Korean nation from advancing toward reconciliation and reunification.
					
					 The Korean people's struggle to reunify the country under the banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration is sure to triumph.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime's Anti-Reunification Moves Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime's Anti-Reunification Moves Flailed
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification (Pomminryon) in a statement on Oct. 4 urged the Lee Myung Bak regime to immediately roll back its anti-reunification policy quite contrary to the June 15 era of reunification and the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					 The statement held that the "National Security Law" (NSL), leftover of the Cold War era, is more harshly applied in south Korea than ever before.
					
					 The racket of unreasonable and indiscriminate suppression being kicked up by the Lee Myung Bak regime in a premeditated manner under the pretext of "liquidating the force behind the candlelight demonstrations" has touched off bitter wrath among all the people, the statement said.
					
					 The Lee regime's anti-reunification moves aimed to turn back the clock of history are bound to meet a miserable end in face of resistance of all Koreans, the statement said, urging it to abolish the NSL, the most evil law, and unconditionally set free pro-reunification patriotic figures.
					
					 The U.S. Regional Headquarters of Pomminryon and the U.S. Regional Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in their statements on Oct. 2 branded the Lee group as a ferocious undemocratic, treacherous and anti-reunification force as it considers fellow countrymen in the north as "enemies" and suppresses anyone who sides with the north on charge of being "a criminal".

articles.title: Pyongyang sera sede del mundial de Taekwon-do de 2011
articles.content:
Pyongyang sera sede del mundial de Taekwon-do de 2011
 Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ATCC) -- Pyongyang, capital de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, volvio a ser elegida como sede del XVII Campeonato Mundial de Taekwon-do despues de 1992 cuando auspicio la VIII edicion de este evento.
					 En la reunion anual del Comite Ejecutivo de la Federacion Internacional de Taekwon-do (FIT), sesionada en febrero de este ano en Viena, Austria, esta capital coreana fue definida como la unica ciudad candidata desaprobando a la otra aspirante, Basel de Suiza.
					
					 Segun ello, en la XVIII asamblea general de la FIT, que tuvo lugar en Uzbekistan en septiembre pasado, se tomo la decision oficial de celebrar el XVII Mundial de 2011 en la RPDC, patria de este arte marcial.
					
					 Esta decision fue apoyada y aprobada calurosamente por los miembros de la FIT y los representantes de cerca de 60 paises participantes en la reunion.
					
					 Esta por fijarse la fecha de esta cita deportiva.

articles.title: Clausurada X Exposicion Nacional de Invenciones y Nuevas Tecnologias
articles.content:
Clausurada X Exposicion Nacional de Invenciones y Nuevas Tecnologias
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ATCC) -- Quedo clausurada este miercoles la X Exposicion Nacional de Invenciones y Nuevas Tecnologias inaugurada el dia primero.
					  En la ocasionfueron exhibidas las invenciones y nuevas tecnicas logradas por los funcionarios, cientificos, tecnicos y trabajadores de todo el pais en varios dominios, incluyendo las industrias electrica, carbonifera y metalurgica y el transporte ferroviario.
					
					 Se tomaron las medidas para introducir los exitos cientifico-tecnicos que pueden contribuir sustancialmente al desarrollo cientifico-tecnico del pais y se realizaron el intercambio tecnico, la circulacion de productos intelectuales y el servicio de datos tecnicos.
					
					 En la ceremonia de clausura, que tuvo lugar el dia 8 en la capitalina Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones, participaron el viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros Ro Tu Chol y otros funcionarios, los cientificos, tecnicos y trabajadores.
					
					 Al pronunciar la palabra de clausura, el presidente de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Pyon Yong Rip, dijo que los cientificos y tecnicos deben dedicar con ardiente patriotismo toda su inteligencia y pasion a la creacion de nuevas tecnologias para contribuir activamente a la prosperidad de la patria.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena al "GPN" del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena al "GPN" del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ATCC) -- Hace poco, los compinches del "Gran Partido Nacional (GPN)" del Sur de Corea, al utilizar los datos del "Ministerio de Reunificacion", dijeron que "es alta la posibilidad" de ser utilizado como "fondo para el desarrollo de las armas nucleares" el dinero enviado durante 10 anos pasados al Norte. Tambien, a base de los datos  absurdos de que recientemente la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea introdujo las armas de otros paises, insistieron en que "esta logro el aumento del poderio militar" mientras que el Sur de Corea "estaba en debate sobre la imprudente asistencia".
					 No puede ser perdonable jamas esta peroracion tendente a insultar las labores de cooperacion Norte-Sur desarrolladas favorablemente a lo largo de estos 10 anos.
					
					Ese disparate muestra el intento criminal del "GPN" para racionalizar sus actos traidores que detuvieron el avance de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de Junio y llevaron al fracaso las relaciones Norte-Sur e inculcar la nueva confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de  este miercoles y continua:
					
					La fuerza disuasiva nuclear de la RPDC que sirve del poderoso medio para la paz de la Peninsula Coreana es el resultado de la linea de la construccion de la economia nacional independiente.
					
					Los compinches del "GPN" no pueden conocerlo jamas. Por esta razon, ellos profieren tales maldiciones absurdas como la "posibilidad del fondo para el desarrollo de las armas nucleares del Norte". 
					
					La cooperacion Norte-Sur no es el trabajo que una parte ofrece los intereses a la otra, sino una labor patriotica para el desarrollo y la prosperidad comunes de la nacion.
					
					Por lo tanto, el "GPN" que trata de abusarlo para su vil objeto politico hablando de cual o tal del respecto es justamente una entidad politica antinacional y anti-reunificacion.
					
					 Ellos, al hablar de los "diez anos perdidos", persiguen el siniestro objetivo de negar todas las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur que apoyan y aplauden todos los coreanos y volver la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de Junio a la de enfrentamiento del pasado.
					
					Actuan arbitrariamente sin contar las consecuencias de su modo de pensar y su accion  capaces de agravar el enfrentamiento con la RPDC.
					
					He aqui precisamente la ignorancia y la tragedia de ellos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras belicas de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras belicas de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ATCC) -- El pasado 23 de septiembre la camara de representantes del Congreso norteamericano aprobo el "proyecto de ley para el fortalecimiento de la cooperacion de defensa" norteamericano-surcoreana cuya esencia es elevar la posicion del Sur de Corea en la compra de armas y pertrechos militares norteamericanos al nivel de la OTAN y luego, el senado dio luz verde al "proyecto de ley" de igual contenido.
					 La aprobacion de este proyecto de ley es revelacion de la intencion de dar toque final a los preparativos de la segunda guerra coreana y estrechar las "relaciones de alianza militar" norteamericano-surcoreana.
					
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 8 y continua:
					
					 Se trata de un acto criminal que exacerba el estado de tension y la confrontacion militar de la Peninsula Coreana y amenaza gravemente la paz.
					
					 EE.UU. intenta tomar a los titeres surcoreanos como fiel "aliado militar" y ejecutor de agresion en el cumplimiento de su estrategia coreana para utilizarlos oportunamente en la guerra.
					
					 EE.UU. atribuye significado importante al establecimiento del control monopolista a la region de Asia en la realizacion de la estrategia al dominio del mundo. Para este fin, intenta tomar la absoluta supremacia estrategica militar en esta region, trata de crear un nuevo "aparato de seguridad" a estilo de la OTAN en la region asiatica y tomarlo por palanca  para aventajarse a Corea y controlar militarmente a Asia. Esto es la intencion estrategica de EE.UU.
					
					 Ahora es precisamente un tiempo en que la RPDC y EE.UU. deben promover el ambiente de confianza y alivio. Pero, EE.UU. toma las medidas legales para el "fortalecimiento de la cooperacion de defensa" con el Sur de Corea con miras a aplastar a Corea y de esta manera exacerba el estado de tension militar e incrementa el peligro de la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana. Esto es un acto anti-pacifico que contraviene a la corriente de la epoca.
					
					 EE.UU. debe reflexionar de las consecuencias que emanen de su proceder y abandonar la temeraria intencion militar.
